addr: Netil House. Broadway Market. London  E8 3RL GB
title: DIY's Not Dead: Winter Home
desc: Join us to: Hear Kate?s top 10 interior design tricks Learn how to achieve paint effects and techniques Get tips for protecting your home from winter Get into the festive spirit with free mulled wine and beer Eat delicious free food from Pronto Grab your Handy goodie bag! A few small changes can transform a house into a home. We want to share those changes with you and help your home look its very best in time for Christmas! Easing you into the festive spirit ?will be stalls for terrariums and Christmas wreath making as well as plenty of games and prizes! So, whether you?re a budding DIYer or just looking for a great way to spend a chilly Wednesday evening, come along and get involved. It?s completely free! Grab your tickets while they last, bring a friend, bring a parent, bring a lover - everyone's welcome. It is on, people.? P.S. Be sure to look out for some exciting surprises from: Rebel Rebel, Pact Coffee, Atlantic Kitchen, Shaken Cocktails, The London Dolls, This Little Piggy Reflexology, and Oblique Life (Following huge demand, our early bird tickets sold out very fast so we have limited tickets to one per person. There are still plenty left but make sure you grab one quick!)
